I am a PhD student at [Monash University, Australia](https://www.monash.edu/business/ebs), supervised by [Professor Rob J. Hyndman](https://robjhyndman.com/), [Dr Xiaoqian Wang](https://xqnwang.rbind.io/), and [Professor Louise M. Ryan](https://profiles.uts.edu.au/Louise.M.Ryan). I am currently working on a project titled "Optimal Predictor Selection for High-dimensional Nonparametric Forecasting".
